subject: dreamweaver cs3 $59
body:
It takes vision and courage to create -- it takes faith and courage to prove.

Be sure that you go to the author to get at his meaning, not to find yours.

We can recognize the dawn and the decline of love by the uneasiness we feel when alone together.

A real decision is measured by the fact that you've taken a new action. If there's no action, you haven't truly decided.

Of course great hotels have always been social ideas, flawless mirrors to the particular societies they service.

You can't expect to meet the challenges of today with yesterday's tools and expect to be in business tomorrow.

You accuse a woman of wavering affections, but don't blame her she is just looking for a consistent man.

By asking for the impossible we obtain the best possible.

You'll never find a better sparring partner than adversity.

There can be a fundamental gulf of gracelessness in a human heart which neither our love nor our courage can bridge.

A sage is the instructor of a hundred ages.

Women have face-lifts in a society in which women without them appear to vanish from sight.

Fishing is a delusion entirely surrounded by liars in old clothes.
